str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
When, whenever, at which time. Of uncertain affinity; at which time.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From epi and strepho; to revert.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A covering, especially a covering of head and face, a veil. From kalupto; a cover, i.e. Veil.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From peri and haireomai; to remove all around, i.e. Unveil, cast off; figuratively, to expiate.
